text: No net proshcheniya tem, kotoryye, sovershiv gnusnost', srazu ne raskaivayutsya, i lish' kogda prikhodit k nim smert', oni govoryat: "YA teper' raskaivayus'". Net proshcheniya takzhe tem, kotoryye umirayut, buduchi nevernymi. Allakh prigotovil takim muchitel'noye nakazaniye v budushchey zhizni
